title: Just in time for the summer!! Two bedroom, top floor home!
neighborhood: hercules, pinole, san pablo, el sob
posting_body: Office Hours are Monday - Friday 9am to 5pm
The Villas at Harbor Pointe perfected the union of the serenity of Pointe Pinole and calm of nature, providing the best retreat from life’s busy schedule.
Conveniently nestled minutes away from highways 80 and 4, the heart of San Francisco is less than an hour away, 20mins away from Berkeley and Concord, and minutes from the new Richmond Ferry.
Our listless community allows for your life to be simplified as we are centrally located to virtually anything life requires.
Multiple grocery stores minutes away (Safeway -- 2 minute walk, Trader Joes -- 5 minute drive, Sprouts -- 8 minute drive, Whole Foods -- 8 minute drive)
25 minute drive to University California Berkeley, 40 minute drive to Downtown San Fransisco
Please reach out to our community to discuss our pet policy and breed restriction
We look forward to hearing from you.
Stop by today to come and experience your new home!
See Us - 585 Sunnyview Drive Pinole, CA 94564
*Photos shown may not be of the exact unit available*
